text: Ian Andrew Healy was born 30 April, 1964 in Brisbane. He is a former cricketer who played 119 tests and 168 one-day internationals for Australia and also played for Queensland in the Sheffield Shield. He held the record of 395 dismissals in test cricket until it was eclipsed by Adam Gilchrist. All four of his first-class centuries were scored in test cricket.Cricinfo: Ian Healy. == References == ==Other websites== * * HowSTAT! statistical profile on Ian Healy Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Australian cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Brisbane
title: Ian Healy
